attributes.action: Scrap the TV license fee and let the corrupt BBC fend for themselves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC have shown themselves to be corrupt and devoid of any integrity.  They are going to train their staff in integrity!!!....at our expense (can you teach integrity?.. I thought it was natural)
Why should WE pay for this and the inflated salaries of the directors and producers.
They have treated the public like idiots and the time has come to scrap this archaic system and let them fund themselves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
